template.name: SFT Request
template.desc: Asks the user for information to be submitted and Approved or Rejected by Security Managers - here the user

forms.name: SFT Review Form
SFT Form

flow.name: orderApproval
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="point.io" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
  <message id="documentApprovalMsg56" name="documentApprovalMsg56"/>
  <message id="helloo" name="helloo"/>
  <message id="msgStartEvent" name="msgStartEvent"/>
  <message id="documentApprovalMessage" name="documentApprovalMessage"/>
  <process id="orderApproval" name="orderApproval" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="start" name="Start Review" activiti:formKey="wf:submitReviewTask"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow1" sourceRef="start" targetRef="exclusivegateway3"/>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway3" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow34" sourceRef="exclusivegateway3" targetRef="setOriginator">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_currentAssignee == ""}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow36" sourceRef="exclusivegateway3" targetRef="servicetask1"/>
    <serviceTask id="setOriginator" name="Set Originator" activiti:class="plugins.wf_Loop_Role">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="roleName">
          <activiti:string>"Originator"</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow32" sourceRef="setOriginator" targetRef="getFacts"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask1" name="Set First Assignee" activiti:expression="#{execution.setVariable("Originator_LIST", wf_currentAssignee)} #{execution.setVariable("Originator_COUNT", 1)} #{execution.setVariable("Originator_LOOP", 0)}"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow37" sourceRef="servicetask1" targetRef="getFacts"/>
    <serviceTask id="getFacts" name="Get Facts" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_listtobe_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${listMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <serviceTask id="addPartyServiceTask" name="Set Parties Manual" activiti:class="plugins.wf_Add_Parties"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow31" name="cancel" sourceRef="exclusivegateway4" targetRef="end">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == "cancel"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask id="mailtask1" name="Notify Final" activiti:type="mail">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="to">
          <activiti:expression>${Originator_LIST}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="from">
          <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="subject">
          <activiti:expression>You are being notified that the Process ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} has completed.</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="html">
          <activiti:expression><p>Process ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} started by ${Originator_LIST} has completed.</p>
<p>
<table>
<tr><td>Approvers:</td><td>${Approver_LIST}</td></tr>
<tr><td>CC:</td><td>${Originator_LIST}</td></tr>
</table>
</p></activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="cc">
          <activiti:expression>${Originator_LIST}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow26" sourceRef="mailtask1" targetRef="end"/>
    <startEvent id="messagestartevent1" name="Message start">
      <messageEventDefinition messageRef="msgStartEvent"/>
    </startEvent>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow46" sourceRef="messagestartevent1" targetRef="mailtask1"/>
    <startEvent id="documentApprovalTrigger" name="documentApprovalTrigger">
      <messageEventDefinition messageRef="documentApprovalMessage"/>
    </startEvent>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow44" sourceRef="documentApprovalTrigger" targetRef="ApproveReject"/>
    <subProcess id="ApproveReject" name="ApproveReject">
      <multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics isSequential="false" activiti:collection="Approver_LIST_COL" activiti:elementVariable="assignee"/>
      <userTask id="review" name="Review Order Request" activiti:assignee="${assignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_review_form">
        <documentation>Review associated documentation and Approve/Reject.</documentation>
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:formProperty id="wf_optionsOutcome" name="Options" type="enum" required="true">
            <activiti:value id="approve" name="Approve"/>
            <activiti:value id="reject" name="Reject"/>
          </activiti:formProperty>
        </extensionElements>
      </userTask>
      <sequenceFlow id="flow27" sourceRef="review" targetRef="reviewDecision"/>
      <exclusiveGateway id="reviewDecision" name="Approve or Reject?"/>
      <sequenceFlow id="flowapprove" name="approved" sourceRef="reviewDecision" targetRef="approveMail">
        <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == 'approve'}</conditionExpression>
      </sequenceFlow>
      <sequenceFlow id="flowreject" name="rejected" sourceRef="reviewDecision" targetRef="selectReason">
        <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == 'reject'}</conditionExpression>
      </sequenceFlow>
      <serviceTask id="approveMail" name="Approved Mail" activiti:type="mail">
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:field name="to">
            <activiti:expression>${Originator_LIST}</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="from">
            <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="subject">
            <activiti:expression>Request ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} is Approved!</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="html">
            <activiti:expression>Your request id ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} has been reviewed and approved by ${assignee}.</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
        </extensionElements>
      </serviceTask>
      <userTask id="selectReason" name="Select Failure Reason" activiti:assignee="${assignee}">
        <documentation>Select reason for Rejection.</documentation>
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:formProperty id="wf_optionsOutcome" name="Rejection Reason" type="enum" required="true">
            <activiti:value id="outofpolicy" name="Out of Policy"/>
            <activiti:value id="duplicate" name="Duplicate Request"/>
            <activiti:value id="invalid" name="Invalid Request"/>
            <activiti:value id="other" name="Other"/>
          </activiti:formProperty>
        </extensionElements>
      </userTask>
      <serviceTask id="rejectMail" name="Rejected Mail" activiti:type="mail">
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:field name="to">
            <activiti:expression>${Originator_LIST}</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="from">
            <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="subject">
            <activiti:expression>Request ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} Rejected</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="html">
            <activiti:expression>Your request id ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} has been reviewed and rejected by ${assignee}.</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
        </extensionElements>
      </serviceTask>
      <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End SubFlow Review"/>
      <sequenceFlow id="flow39" sourceRef="approveMail" targetRef="endevent1"/>
      <sequenceFlow id="flow40" sourceRef="rejectMail" targetRef="endevent1"/>
      <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start SubFlow Review"/>
      <sequenceFlow id="flow52" sourceRef="selectReason" targetRef="rejectMail"/>
      <serviceTask id="reviewMail" name="Review Mail" activiti:type="mail">
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:field name="to">
            <activiti:expression>${assignee}</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="from">
            <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="subject">
            <activiti:expression>Request ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} requires your Approval</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="html">
            <activiti:expression>The request id ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} needs to be reviewed.
Please click on the new Review Order Request task <a href="http://localhost:9000/apps#/apps">here</a>.</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
        </extensionElements>
      </serviceTask>
      <sequenceFlow id="flow57" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="reviewMail"/>
      <sequenceFlow id="flow58" sourceRef="reviewMail" targetRef="review"/>
    </subProcess>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow41" sourceRef="ApproveReject" targetRef="inclusivegateway1"/>
    <inclusiveGateway id="inclusivegateway1" name="Inclusive Gateway"/>
    <endEvent id="end" name="End Review"/>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway4" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow53" sourceRef="addPartyServiceTask" targetRef="exclusivegateway4"/>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Fill Order Form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_fillOrderForm"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow54" sourceRef="getFacts" targetRef="usertask1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow55" sourceRef="usertask1" targetRef="addPartyServiceTask"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow56" name="continue" sourceRef="exclusivegateway4" targetRef="ApproveReject"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow59" sourceRef="inclusivegateway1" targetRef="mailtask1"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_orderApproval">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="orderApproval" id="BPMNPlane_orderApproval">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="start" id="BPMNShape_start">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="90.0" y="-170.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway3" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway3">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="150.0" y="-173.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="setOriginator" id="BPMNShape_setOriginator">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="240.0" y="-224.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="servicetask1" id="BPMNShape_servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="240.0" y="-140.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="getFacts" id="BPMNShape_getFacts">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="400.0" y="-180.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="addPartyServiceTask" id="BPMNShape_addPartyServiceTask">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="530.0" y="-140.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="mailtask1" id="BPMNShape_mailtask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="900.0" y="-70.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="messagestartevent1" id="BPMNShape_messagestartevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="830.0" y="-60.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="documentApprovalTrigger" id="BPMNShape_documentApprovalTrigger">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="110.0" y="301.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="ApproveReject" id="BPMNShape_ApproveReject">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="249.0" width="686.0" x="190.0" y="194.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="review" id="BPMNShape_review">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="290.0" y="360.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="reviewDecision" id="BPMNShape_reviewDecision">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="415.0" y="281.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="approveMail" id="BPMNShape_approveMail">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="478.0" y="220.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="selectReason" id="BPMNShape_selectReason">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="59.0" width="105.0" x="478.0" y="326.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="rejectMail" id="BPMNShape_rejectMail">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="635.0" y="328.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="805.0" y="338.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="215.0" y="284.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="reviewMail" id="BPMNShape_reviewMail">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="290.0" y="260.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="inclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_inclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="930.0" y="298.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="end" id="BPMNShape_end">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="935.0" y="-190.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway4" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway4">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="660.0" y="-133.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="400.0" y="-60.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow1" id="BPMNEdge_flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="125.0" y="-153.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="150.0" y="-153.0"/>

        <omgdi:waypoint x="400.0" y="-153.0"/>

      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flowapprove" id="BPMNEdge_flowapprove">

        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>

        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>

        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="14.0" width="41.0" x="690.0" y="-93.0"/>

      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow59" id="BPMNEdge_flow59">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="950.0" y="298.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="952.0" y="-15.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
